task.title: How to Make a Breakfast Hash
task.shortdesc: Wants something filling but healthy? This Vegan Breakfast Hash will certainly do the job.

ul.li: 1 medium green or red bell pepper, finely diced
8 ounces package tempeh meat substitute, finely diced
6 leaves kale, stemmed and finely chopped
Salt and black pepper to taste

step.cmd: Microwave the potatoes whole for 10 minutes until done but still firm and finely dice them.
Heat the oil in a large skillet.
Add the onion and sauté over MEDIUM heat until translucent.
Add the bell pepper, tempeh, and potatoes.
Turn the heat up to MEDIUM HIGH, and continue to sauté until all are turning golden brown and stir frequently.
Continue to cook, stirring frequently, until the mixture is touched with brown spots here and there.
Season with salt and pepper and serve immediately.
